text: kavurun (tamange) modakama nisa papayan kara, (eya papayak yayi dæna gattayin) pasu pasutævili vi itamat sighrayen (eyin) æt vannoda, evænnanta samava dima allah kerehi anivaryaya yutukamak bavata pat vanneya. ebævin allah ovunva adarayen yutuva balanneya. allah hondin danneku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
